name: MSCRM-ADDONS.COM
tagline: Your company for MS CRM addons!
description: MSCRM-ADDONS.COM is a corporation sector of PTM EDV-Systems GmbH, a software company founded in 1998 and situated in Graz, Austria. We are a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner and provide a high standard of knowledge, skills and commitment. We specialise in the development and implementation of specific software solutions for our customers. Some time ago, we came to the decision that certain functionalities were missing, which could improve the benefit of using Microsoft Dynamics CRM.
